column1: old
column2: new

column1: ギルスタンという名に聞き覚えはあるか？
column2: Does the name Gilstan ring a bell?

column1:
――その様子では知らないようだな
となれば、好都合だ
おまえに頼むことにしよう
column2:
――It seems you're unaware of them.
Well, that works out conveniently.
I'll entrust you with it.

column1:
おれは《ブラッドオーブ》に頼らずに
白竜の石化を食い止める――
あるいは症状を改善する方法を探していた
column2:
I've been searching for a way to stop
the petrification of the White Dragon,
or at least improve its condition, 
without relying on the "Blood Orb."

column1:
《ブラッドオーブ》は稀少なくせに
効果が大きいとは言い難いからな
column2:
Blood Orbs may be rare, but it's hard to say that 
its effects are significant.

column1:
しかし、賛同者たちの協力にもかかわらず
これまで、まったくと言っていいほど
他の方法は見つかっていない
column2:
However, despite the cooperation of supporters, 
so far, there has been no other method found.

column1:
それらしいウワサ話は幾つも聞いたが
確認してみると、いい加減なものばかりだった
column2:
I heard several plausible rumors,
but when I checked, they were all just baseless.

column1:
そして今、新たな情報が入った
古文書を多数所持している者がいて
その文書には失われた知識が
幾つも記されているということだ
column2:
And now, new information has come in. 
There is someone who possesses numerous 
ancient documents, and it is said that these 
documents contain countless pieces of 
lost knowledge.

column1: 我々が求めている情報もあるかもしれない
column2: There may also be information that we are seeking.

column1:
持ち主の名はギルスタン
人間と覚者を忌み嫌う老ゴブリンだ
はるか東の洞窟に住んでいる
column2:
The name of the owner is Gilstan. He is an old 
Goblin who despises humans and Arisen. 
He lives in a cave far to the east.

column1:
そこへ行って古文書を譲り受ける――
あるいは奪い取る――
方法はおまえに任せるから引き受けてくれ
column2:
Go there and accept the ancient document---
or snatch it away---
I'll leave the method up to you, 
so please accept the task.

column1:
古文書の持ち主の名はギルスタン
遠い東の洞窟に住む老ゴブリンだ
column2:
The name of the owner of the ancient document is 
Gilstan.
He is an old Goblin who lives in a distant cave 
to the east.

column1: なるべく、穏便にな
column2: As peacefully as possible.

column1:
残念ながらごくわずかではありますが
白竜様のうろこがまた石となってしまいました
column2:
Unfortunately, a few of the White Dragon's scales
have once again turned to stone.

column1: 《ブラッドオーブ》さえあれば――
column2: If only I had Blood Orbs...

column1:
もし時間があるなら魔物を倒して
《ブラッドオーブ》を持ち帰るんだ
あれは幾らあっても足りないということはない
column2:
If you have time, defeat the enemies and 
bring back the Blood Orbs.
You can never have enough of them.

column1: イリスはどこにいるんだろうね――
column2: I wonder where Iris is--

column1: フン――人か――しかも覚者だな！
column2: Hmph—A human—And an Arisen, no less!

column1:
まったく――
追い出しても倒しても、こりずに来やがル
column2:
Truly--

No matter how many times you drive them away or 
knock them down, they just keep coming back.

column1:
ナんだ？　古文書？　ナんだそれは？
ああ、本か――あのよく燃えるヤツだな
それを欲しいというのか？
column2:
What is it?　Ancient documents?　What's that?
Oh, books--those flammable things.
You want some of those?

column1:
ほう――へぇ――よし、わかったヨ
頼みをきいてくれたらアレをくれてやってもいい
外に魔物がいっぱい住みついて困ってるんダ
ヤツらを退治してくれ
column2:
Oh—Hmm—Alright, got it.
If you help me out, I'll give you that.
There are lots of monsters outside causing trouble.
Get rid of them for me.

column1: そしたら、あれこれ、良くしてやるヨ
column2: Then, I'll do this and that to help you out.

column1:
なんだ？　引き受けておいて何してル？
ゴブリンをなめるなヨ？
column2:
What? You accepted the task, 
so why aren't you doing anything?
Don't underestimate goblins, alright?

column1:
ニンゲンニンゲン何シニ来タ！
ゴブリンノ王、ギルスタンノ城！
出テイケスグイケ！
column2:
Humans, humans, what have they come here for!
Goblin King, ruler of the fortress of Gilstan!
Leave now or face consequences!

column1:
ギギギー！　ムカツク、ツクー！
許サナイ謝ッテモダメ！
column2:
Gigigee! How irritating, so irritating!
I won't forgive you, 
no matter how much you apologize!

column1:
ナンダー！？　ナンダー！？
盗ンダラ許サナイゾ！
石コロヒトツデモ許サナイゾ！
column2:
What?! What?! 
I won't forgive you for stealing!
I won't forgive even a single pebble!

column1:
人間ノ浅ハカナトコロ――
自分達ガモットモ賢イコ思ッテルトコロ
column2:
Humans are shallow beings, 
thinking they are clever in everything.

column1:
他ノ種族ヲ愚カダト信ジテイル
話セバワカルノニ、スグ暴レル
column2:
They underestimate other races as fools,
and if you tell them, 
they immediately resort to violence.

column1: おっと！　魔物をやっつけたのか！？
column2: Whoa! Did you defeat the monster!?

column1:
へえ――おまえはヤルなあ
面倒だから仲良くしような
あれこれ、良くしてやるヨ
column2:
Oh, so you did it.
Since it's a hassle, let's get along.
I'll do this and that to help you out.

column1:
ええと、あの古い本が欲しいんだったナ？
ほら、約束通り、やるヨ！
受け取ったら、とっとと帰ってくれ
column2:
Uh, you want that old book, right?
Here, I'll give it to you as promised!
Take it and get the hell out of here.

column1: まだ何か用か？
column2: Still need something?

column1:
そうだ――
もし《ブラッドオーブ》があったら持って来い
いろんな珍しいモノと交換してやるヨ
column2:
Yes--
If you have any Blood Orbs, bring them to me.
I'll trade them for all sorts of unusual things.

column1:
出テイケ！
用ガスンダラ出テイケスグイケ！
column2:
Leave!
I have no use for you, leave now!

column1:
ギギギー！　ムカツク、ツクー！
魔物ニ友ダチヤラレタヤラレタ！
column2:
Gigigee! So irritating, so irritating!
Befriended by monsters, you've become!

column1:
――何！？　退治シテクレタ！？
スゲー！　覚者スゲー！
column2:
What!? You defeated it!?
Amazing! The Arisen is amazing!

column1:
オマエ盗人ジャナイノカ！？
オデ、勘違イ――謝ラナイケド！
column2:
Are you not a thief!?
Sorry, I misunderstood—I won't apologize!

column1:
何ダ――、ほゥ約束守ッタカ
魔物ヲ倒したと言ウのダな
column2:
What—did you keep your promise?
You did say you defeated the monster.

column1: ソレは凄イナ、マタ王のタメ働ケ
column2:
That's impressive, huh? 
You'll work for the king again.

column1:
ん？　どこへ行ってきたんだ？
少々魔物くさいが――
column2:
Hm? Where did you go?
You smell a bit like monsters—

column1:
白竜の輝くうろこが――
ほら、首のあたりがくすんでしまいました――
column2:
The shining scales of the white dragon--
See, they've dulled around the neck--

column1:
レオに身体を空けておけっていわれてるけど
何かあるのかな？
君があるモノを持ち帰るとかなんとか――
column2:
Leo told me to keep my distance.
Is something up?
You're supposed to bring something back or what?

column1: ギルスタンはどうだった？
column2: How was Gilstan?

column1:
――そうか――よくやった
では、その古文書を見せてくれ
column2:
――So, I see―― Well done.
Now, please show me that ancient document.

column1:
ふん――まったく読めないな
おそらく、今は使われていない文字だ
いや、かつて使われていたのか否かも怪しい
column2:
Hmph... I can't read you at all. 
Probably old characters not used now. 
Or maybe never used, who knows.

column1:
どうせこんなことだろうと
クラウスに声をかけてある
文書の解読は、あいつに任せよう
column2:
Anyway, let's call out to Klaus. 
Leave the deciphering of the document to him.

column1:
とりあえず、ご苦労だったな
ゆっくり休んでくれ
column2:
For now, you've worked hard. 
Take a good rest.

column1: 準備できたら声を掛けてくれ
column2: Give me a shout when you're ready.

column1:
一緒にやりたいこと、相談したいこと――
頼みたいことが山ほどある
column2:
There are so many things I want to do with you, 
things I want to talk to you about-- 
so much I want to ask you for help with.

column1:
【ヒント：魔物掃討について】
ギルスタンからの魔物掃討依頼は
難易度の高い依頼です
ホボリック洞穴を拠点に、
装備と戦技を整えて挑みましょう
column2:
【Hint: Monster Eradication】
Monster eradication requests from 
Gilstan are high-difficulty tasks. 

Prepare your equipment and skills at 
Hobolic Cave before attempting.
